summary: Implemented Error Center log tail with per-tab filtering and task links.
Reviewed architecture doc and added Editor logic summarizer with markdown export.
Rewrapped regression test lines to satisfy flake8 and confirmed validation suite.
Upgraded Editor card with chat, notes, syntax highlighting, and Virtual Desktop storage wiring.
Implement Virtual Desktop card centering, taskbar icon grouping, Start search facets, containment guard, and Explorer thumbnails.
Implemented Virtual Desktop card centering, taskbar icon grouping, Start search facets, containment guard, and Explorer thumbnails.
Implemented Virtual Desktop background manager with selectable image/GIF/video/GL layers and updated settings/context menu.
Added desktop New templates, sort controls, and settings-section focus links.
Built LiveScript GL viewport with hot reload/FPS cap, added controller tests, documented design.
Persisted Error Center records into datasets/errors.jsonl with category metadata.
Added terminal safety guardrails with confirmation prompts and Error Center logging.
Audited governance assets; verified sentinel/watch workflows and memory files remain present.
Implemented repository indexing CLI with embeddings and regression tests.
Implemented session-aware conversation log archival with rollover metadata.
Externalized agent prompts with overlay loader and settings access.
Added system metrics collector, SQLite persistence, and scheduled refresh publication.
Refactored system metrics persistence through metrics_manager with runtime scoring and tests.
Added Virtual Desktop System Overview card with metrics filters, charts, Start launch, and auto-refresh hooks.
Pinned the System Overview launcher in Start and ensured the desktop core opens the metrics card with persistence.
Adjust Codex Terminal to skip its desktop when embedded, create Terminal Desktop workspace folder, and add regression coverage.
Enabled resizable Terminal Desktop with persistent geometry and expanded chat card minimums for the Tasks drawer.
Refactored ChatCard to use a themed ConversationView that renders inline think content, attachments, and Codex bridge statuses while keeping logging intact.
Implemented Codex approval prompt parser and widget with regression tests.
Added sandbox defaults and Settings dialog sandbox card with persisted selections.
Added global card scaling controls with settings UI and geometry persistence updates.
Refined Settings dialog tab styling to improve tab legibility.
Aligned terminal desktop geometry restore with centered fallback and regression coverage.
Persisted Virtual Desktop taskbar side, updated docking/Start panel geometry, added Windows offset helper, scaffolded Dev_Logic ledger folders, and wrote geometry tests.
Adjusted StartPanel search reset to rebuild placeholder labels per run; noted PySide6 missing so Qt-dependent tests fail.
Rewired Virtual Desktop SettingsPanel close button to call VirtualDesktopCore._close_settings directly.
Updated Settings dialog group box titles and labels to share the light theme foreground.
Persisted interpreter toggle across settings, surfaced runtime slider controls, and documented PySide6 test gaps.
Extended interpreter toggle regression coverage to ensure offline tooltip copy and disabled state.
Linked Tasks panel load action to conversation lookup and ChatCard hydration pipeline.
Refreshed interpreter prompts, loader defaults, and voice guidance to enforce STOP completion signals.
Hardened Codex approval prompt parsing to display Select/Choose options and added regression coverage.
Added User Guided Notes card with Qt UI, notes persistence, deterministic embeddings, and export routines; documented missing PySide6 blocking Qt tests.
Ensure Codex bridge launch uses the saved working folder when valid and defaults to Codex-Transit otherwise; added monkeypatched regression tests.
Added pane toggle toolbar to User Guided Notes with per-note visibility persistence.
Add repo reference helper with ChatInput suggestions and metadata logging.
Start panel cursor-exit auto-dismiss wired into VirtualDesktopCore with regression tests; environment still lacks flake8 and PySide6 so Qt suite fails during validation.
Implemented ProcessErrorCard to capture subprocess stderr, append ErrorCenter records, and emit isolation toasts; flake8 binary and PySide6 remain unavailable so Qt validations fail.
Prevented Codex approval tokens from appearing in chat output and added regression tests.
Documented Guru Codex chat persona updates covering workspace precedence, approval token etiquette, repository visibility, citations, and safety guardrails.
Adjusted Virtual Desktop canvas sync to subtract Windows taskbar height only when maximized (not fullscreen) and expanded geometry tests.
Refined Virtual Desktop fit scheduling with in-progress guard, screen-change queueing, and geometry alignment skip; flake8 and PySide6 remain missing for validation.
Added User Guided Notes pop-out toggle with Virtual Desktop hand-off and updated Qt tests.
Refreshed User Guided Notes theme helper with light/dark palettes, font scaling toggle, and layout tuning; validation blocked by missing PySide6/flake8.
Adjusted Virtual Desktop maximize fit to compare client geometry with tolerance so Windows launch no longer toggles states.
Adjusted Virtual Desktop layout margins so Windows taskbar offsets no longer double the horizontal thickness.
Aligned desktop icon drag snapping with shared grid origin and documented validation gaps (flake8, PySide6).
Embed Windows GUI apps via ExternalAppCard and update Virtual Desktop process loading fallback.
Limit DesktopIcon single-clicks to selection while keeping double-click open behavior.
Refreshed DesktopIcon hover/selection UI, QFileInfo tooltip details, and QDrag reposition workflow; validation blocked by missing flake8/PySide6.
Restructured StartPanel pinned area into list + icon grid with synced type labels; validation blocked by missing PySide6/flake8.
Persist Start menu close preference with Click Off vs Auto Close modes, add settings controls, and wire global click dismissal.
Resolved DesktopCanvas core lookup with weakref caching and routed icon opens/context menu to VirtualDesktopCore.open_any_path.
Retitled Settings panel/card to "Virtual Desktop Settings" and logged design/testing context; flake8 binary and PySide6 deps still missing.
Expose desktop sort order control in Settings and refresh canvas arrangement.
Refreshed StartPanel sidebar to show recent recommendations with compact icons while preserving pinned grid selection; validation blocked by missing PySide6/flake8.
Make ExternalAppCard embed timeout configurable and add Windows regression coverage for slow embeds.
Accept DesktopCanvas URL drops, copy into VDSK_ROOT, refresh icons, and cover with Qt drop regression.
Trimmed StartPanel pinned layout minimums to let recommendations and pinned grid share width responsively; validation pending missing PySide6/flake8.
Updated StartPanel pinned buttons to show text under icons with expanded sizing; design doc captured and validations note missing PySide6/flake8.
Resolved Windows document association launching by resolving associated executables and adding Windows regression coverage; validations blocked by missing PySide6/flake8.
Cache StartPanel path icons via helper with Blender regression; PySide6 missing for Qt tests.
Enforced single-card behavior for Virtual Desktop cards and added regression coverage ensuring replacements close prior cards.
Cleared Virtual Desktop card drag drop-shadow trails by repainting cached effect bounds.
Seeded Virtual_Desktop workspace with starter assets and documentation.
